title: New Irelia need a Penny Skin (RWBY)
body:
https://i.pinimg.com/736x/fa/fa/cb/fafacb931a49eb9989bb122b3bf48287--rwby-penny-pennies.jpg

It fits perfectly for Irelia now with the floating blades.  Even Irelia's new W looks fairly similar to Penny's laser attack.

https://orig00.deviantart.net/c466/f/2017/024/3/9/tumblr_inline_ny782kzn9z1spa9sy_500_by_warpstar930-dawmtmb.gif

vs.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeSg7Cc_uMY

Imagine her saying at the start of the match and/or as a taunt, "I'm combat ready!"

I know it won't happen, but it would just be so great if it did.

replies.body: Great then when I lane against Irelia I'll be able to cry out of actual sadness instead of frustration
what about a Qrow Kayn? xD
